name: Remote Staff
tagline: We Make Remote Staffing Work. We Make It Last
description:
Remote Staff is an Australian BPO Company; the leader in innovative and effective offshore outsourcing. We provide committed and skilled contractors for businesses of all types. These contractors are hired to work with you like regular employees with fixed schedule and within your time zone. Our staff management system allows you to monitor your staff.
It has the screen capture feature which takes a snapshot of your staff's computer screen every 3 minutes and task percentage every 20 or 30 minutes allowing you to supervise your staff in the other side of the globe in realt-time. Our customer support team and compliance team are ready to back you up whenever you have concerns. We monitor the staff's attendance and assure that they are performing work-related tasks to avoid payment of questionable logs. We also manage the payroll and resolve attendance-related issues whenever necessary. With Remote Staff, you can save up to 70% on recruitment fees and we aim not only to make business but also to build relationship.
